FXCM API Developer Documentation
===================================

**Algorithmic Trading APIs for Forex and CFDs**:

FXCM offers APIs ideal to automate your trading strategies. Learn about our REST API, FIX, JAVA and ForexConnect.


.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: RESTful API:
   
   restapi
   
.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: FXCM Python Wrapper
   
   fxcmpy
   
.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: REST Sample Codes:
   
   pythonrest
   fxcmrest-php.rst
   realcasebt   
   
.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: FIX API:
   
   fixapi
   fixcode
   
.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Java API:
   
   javaapi
   javabacktest
   
.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: ForexConnect API:
   
   forexconnectapi
   forexconnectbt
   
.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Marketdata:
   
   marketdata
   
   support
   license
